00035 #ifndef _wscompand_h
00036 #define _wscompand_h
00037 
00038 #include <fromsys.h>
00039 #include <defs.h>
00040 #include <banal.h>
00041 #include <splitfields.h>
00042 #include <datatypes.h>
00043 #include <bufvec.h>
00044 #include <cxops.h>
00045 
00046 typedef struct _wscompander
00047 {
00048     int npts,
00049         nend;
00050     REAL fac,
00051         *tbl;
00052     CXB buff;
00053 } WSCompanderInfo, *WSCompander;
00054 
00055 extern void WSCompand( WSCompander wsc );
00056 
00057 // fac < 0: compression
00058 // fac > 0: expansion
00059 
00060 extern void WSCReset( WSCompander wsc, REAL fac );
00061 extern WSCompander newWSCompander( int npts, REAL fac, CXB buff );
00062 extern void delWSCompander( WSCompander wsc );
00063 
00064 #endif /*  */
